verses.verse: Hold not your peace<WH2790>, O God<WH430> of my praise<WH8416>;
For the mouth<WH6310> of the wicked<WH7563> and the mouth<WH6310> of the deceitful<WH4820> are opened<WH6605> against me<WH1696>: they have spoken against me with a lying<WH8267> tongue<WH3956>.
They surrounded<WH5437> me about also with words<WH1697> of hatred<WH8135>; and fought<WH3898> against me without a cause<WH2600>.
For my love<WH160> they are my adversaries<WH7853>: but I give myself unto prayer<WH8605>.
And they have rewarded<WH7760> me evil<WH7451> for good<WH2896>, and hatred<WH8135> for my love<WH160>.
Set<WH6485> you a wicked man<WH7563> over him<WH7854>: and let Satan stand<WH5975> at his right hand<WH3225>.
When he shall be judged<WH8199>, let him be<WH3318> condemned<WH7563>: and let his prayer<WH8605> become sin<WH2401>.
Let his days<WH3117> be few<WH4592>; and let another<WH312> take<WH3947> his office<WH6486>.
Let his sons<WH1121> be fatherless<WH3490>, and his wife<WH802> a widow<WH490>.
Let his sons<WH1121> be continually<WH5128> vagabonds<WH5128>, and beg<WH7592>: let them seek<WH1875> their bread also out of their desolate places<WH2723>.
Let the extortioner<WH5383> catch<WH5367> all that he has<WH2114>; and let the strangers plunder<WH962> his labor<WH3018>.
Let there be none to extend<WH4900> mercy<WH2617> unto him<WH2603>: neither let there be any to favor his fatherless sons<WH3490>.
Let his posterity<WH319> be cut off<WH3772>; and in the generation<WH1755> following<WH312> let their name<WH8034> be blotted out<WH4229>.
Let the iniquity<WH5771> of his fathers<WH1> be remembered<WH2142> with the Lord<WH3068>; and let not the sin<WH2403> of his mother<WH517> be blotted out<WH4229>.
Let them be before the Lord<WH3068> continually<WH8548>, that he may cut off<WH3772> the memory<WH2143> of them from the earth<WH776>.

Because that he remembered<WH2142> not to show<WH6213> mercy<WH2617>, but persecuted<WH7291> the poor<WH6041> and needy<WH34> man<WH376>, that he might even kill<WH4191> the broken<WH3512> in heart<WH3824>.
As he loved<WH157> cursing<WH7045>, so let it come<WH935> unto him<WH2654>: as he delighted not in blessing<WH1293>, so let it be far from him<WH7368>.
As he clothed<WH3847> himself with cursing<WH7045> like as with his garment<WH4055>, so let it come<WH935> into his bowels<WH7130> like water<WH4325>, and like oil<WH8081> into his bones<WH6106>.
Let it be unto him as the garment<WH899> which covers<WH5844> him<WH4206>, and for a belt with which he is girded<WH2296> continually<WH8548>.
Let this be the reward<WH6468> of my adversaries<WH7853> from the Lord<WH3068>, and of them that speak<WH1696> evil<WH7451> against my soul<WH5315>.
But do<WH6213> you for me<WH3069>, O God the Lord<WH136>, for your name<WH8034>'s sake<WH2617>: because your mercy is good<WH2896>, deliver you me<WH5337>.
For I am poor<WH6041> and needy<WH34>, and my heart<WH3820> is wounded<WH2490> inside me<WH7130>.
I am gone<WH1980> like the shadow<WH6738> when it declines<WH5186>: I am tossed up and down<WH5287> as the locust<WH697>.
My knees<WH1290> are weak<WH3782> through fasting<WH6685>; and my flesh<WH1320> fails<WH3584> of fatness<WH8081>.
I became also a reproach<WH2781> unto them<WH7200>: when they looked upon me they shaked<WH5128> their heads<WH7218>.
Help<WH5826> me<WH3068>, O Lord my God<WH430>: O save<WH3467> me according to your mercy<WH2617>:
That they may know<WH3045> that this is your hand<WH3027>; that you<WH3068>, Lord, have done it<WH6213>.
Let them curse<WH7043>, but bless<WH1288> you<WH6965>: when they arise, let them be ashamed<WH954>; but let your servant<WH5650> rejoice<WH8055>.
Let my adversaries<WH7853> be clothed<WH3847> with shame<WH3639>, and let them cover<WH5844> themselves with their own confusion<WH1322>, as with a mantle<WH4598>.
I will greatly<WH3966> praise<WH3034> the Lord<WH3068> with my mouth<WH6310>; Yes<WH1984>, I will praise him among<WH8432> the multitude<WH7227>.
For he shall stand<WH5975> at the right hand<WH3225> of the poor<WH34>, to save<WH3467> him from those that condemn<WH8199> his soul<WH5315>.
